this is by far the worst game of the fallout series ive played it feels very clunky and movement is just off i have already encountered numerous bugs that stopped me from completing quests the game is laughably easy almost everything drops stimpacks and radaways so there is virtually no way of dying you can run up to an enemy 5x your level and beat it with a knife and a handful of stimpacks i have at no point received any satisfaction for completing a quest or killing an enemy

for how shitty the gunplay gameplay fetch quests and levelling system for guns is its actually pretty fun its the usual mmorpg problems with the grind but if youve got a friend its a banger tbh  also melee is more fun then guns all together i beat some guy with a hammer made of a god damn drum called the war drum and made my pitchfork that does 121 damage on fire  not to mention the goofy ragdolls you can see with said melees  solid 810 game better with friends
